projects.name: Shadowed Depths
projects.description: My first Unity game for a college final project. Proof of concept of a 2D topdown roguelike, inspired by my love of Legend of Zelda and WoW. Still a couple bugs to work out (as shown in the video towards the end) but overall pretty happy with how this turned out.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Re-wrote my protfolio website using Next.js to solidify what was learned in the second year of College. Skills used are importing data from a JSON file, dynamically routing pages, sending emails through a forum with nodemailer, styling.

projects.name: Mock Band Website
projects.description: A Midterm project for my first year in College, which required us to learn how to use video elements as backgrounds. Skills used here were only HTML/CSS, no JavaScript or any oustide help was used. Some small bugs that didn't unfortunately get fixed in time for submission, but for a first attempt at a website, not so bad!
